creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: cream paper carton with tan stripes, wooden box with inscriptions; wrapped in tissue; tan and green/gold fabric; image of a mountain with red around it; two line inscription along L edge
inscription: 萬古高擎日　神州第一山　温容使人敬　獨立天地間 (For ten thousand ages, towering, clutching the sun: / The premier mountain of this, the Sacred Realm! / Its warm visage makes men bow in reverence, / Standing alone between Heaven and Earth.) [Jonathan Chaves]
markings: poem UR red seal: 无心 {mushin} [mushin #3]; poem LL red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #4], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #4]
title: Morning Sun Over Mount Fuji
